attributes.action: consider replacing the current electoral system with the Single Transerable Vote (STV), which is already is use in Ulster.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has discussed the possibility of a referendum on the Alternative Vote (AV).  While this is welcome, AV does not allow the same scope for democratic choice as STV.  We would ask the Prime Minister to consider STV as a means of widening democracy and empowering the electorate.
